title: anyone knows where i can download and edit the recently played games
body: i was trying to use and record a play i made in  the theater mode in the game but tbh its dog shit and gets really laggy when the fights start i dont know what to use to to record my gameplay. :(

replies.body: You can download your games from the League client. Just go to profile->match history and you hale a small download button right next to each game you’ve played. As for editing, I recommend you use “Shotcut” . It’s free and easy to use. Good luck summoner.
